version_description:
Add auto save function, the photo will be saved automatically after shoot for saving operation time.
(If you want to preview photo before save, please disable auto save function in setting page. Thank you!)

Fix bugs on iOS 10
And limit the position of Date/Time/Note to prevent them been drag out of screen
Modify advertisement position according to Google Admob's requirement
Update advertisement position to prevent mistouch
Fix crash problem and update libraries.
